doc:
Doris Doscher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doris_Doscher 0 Doris Doscher (January 24, 1882 – March 9, 1970) was an American actress and model who appeared in the movie The Birth of a Race (1915), playing the role of "Eve." She posed as Liberty for the Standing Liberty quarter (1916–1930) by Hermon Atkins MacNeil. She was also the model for the Pulitzer Fountain of Abundance by Karl Bitter (completed by Isidore Konti and Karl Gruppe in 1915) in front of the Plaza Hotel in New York City. Doris_Doscher ( January_24_,_1882 – March_9_,_1970 ) was an_American_actress and model who appeared in the_movie The_Birth of a_Race ( 1915 ) , playing the_role of " Eve . " She posed as Liberty for the_Standing_Liberty_quarter_(_1916 – 1930_) by Hermon_Atkins_MacNeil . She was also the_model for the_Pulitzer_Fountain of Abundance by Karl_Bitter (_completed by Isidore_Konti and Karl_Gruppe in 1915_) in front of the_Plaza_Hotel in New_York_City .
